name: Harvest Thy Souls
description:
Team Name Team Ascension

Gameplay Instructions > Use 'A' and 'D' to move. Use 'Spacebar' to shoot.

> Cross a building to Claim all the souls from it.
> Keep moving right to claim more souls.
> If any building is lost to a demon, reclaim it.
> Stand near the Green lamps to Heal yourself and recharge your shooting power.
> You will NOT be able to shoot while recharging.
>Your target is to reach the Red Pillar on the right end while keeping all buildings blue.
